summary: Unfinished mod to add a kilt, that looks like a kilt, moves like a kilt, and is easy to change the tartan on.
descriptionHtml:
The first mod I attempted.  Was unhappy with available kilt, tartan mods at the time, so decided to make my own.  Couldn't find meshes that really did what I wanted, so I ended up making new meshes from scratch.  Through trial and error, I think I got the meshes to work without any clipping.  Problem I ran into was trying to get the lighting to work on the textures.  After spending way too many hours reading modding guides online and trying to figure it out, I eventually lost interest and just gave up.  After better part of a year, I have picked up playing Skyrim again, so I thought I would appeal to the nexus community for someone to finish my mod.  Currently, the mod can be loaded and the kilt crafted at a forge, but the .esp is a mess and poorly organized.  It would probably be easier for someone who knows what they are doing to use my meshes with a new .esp.

I was also planning on adding a belt, so it looks right with a sword sheathed on the hip, maybe making the kilt look rougher and more lived in.  I tend to play with the shirtless default fur kilt, so I wasn't planning on adding a shirt, or cuiress, but feel free.  Anyone that wants to uses the meshes I made for other mods is free to do so.  I offer this to the nexus community, do what you will.
author: LoganBruce
